quoteText: Turnitin is free to use any ideas, concepts, techniques, know-how or information in Your Communications for any purpose, including, but not limited to, the development and use of products and services based on the Communications. For example, if you were to suggest a feature for us to add to our Service or Site, we would be free to do that without your further permission or the need for compensation to be made to you. This Communication license expressly excludes personally identifiable Registration Data of students, any papers submitted to the Site, and grades and assessment related information.
title: This service can use your content, with some exceptions, for all their existing and future services

tosdr.case: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
tosdr.tldr: Turnitin can use your content for their services, excluding personally identifiable data, papers, and grades and assessment related information.
